name: the kidnapping part 1
description: You are going to a new school, your scared because you know no one. In Spanish class you get to work with a partner to do a project, you didn’t finish it, so you go to your partners house to complete the project. While you arrive at the house the outside looks very dark, old and creepy. You get invited in, it looks abended, even though it is creeping you out you decided just to forget about how it looks and focus on the project you must finish. After you and you partner are finished you go to the bathroom, the lights go out … you wake up in a garage, tightened up on a chair. You realise you have been kidnapped! You want to escape! While you are carefully walking though the house, you remember that this is your partner from the project you were working with…
